modulesToAdd.title: Python for Data Science & ML Foundations
modulesToAdd.reason: Establishes fundamental programming, data manipulation, and preparation skills essential for all AI/ML roles.

modulesToAdd.title: Core Machine Learning Concepts & Algorithms
modulesToAdd.reason: Covers foundational machine learning theory, algorithms, and practical implementation using a standard library.

modulesToAdd.title: Deep Learning Frameworks & Architectures
modulesToAdd.reason: Addresses the core of modern AI, focusing on popular deep learning frameworks and their application.

modulesToAdd.title: MLOps & Model Deployment
modulesToAdd.reason: Crucial for taking AI models from development to production, covering deployment strategies and tools.

modulesToAdd.title: Natural Language Processing (NLP)
modulesToAdd.reason: Dedicated module for a major AI subfield, including modern tools and techniques for text data.

modulesToAdd.title: Computer Vision
modulesToAdd.reason: Dedicated module for another major AI subfield, covering image and video processing with a key library.
